name: Samba
short_description: SMB/CIFS file sharing server for network storage access.
description: SMB/CIFS file sharing server for network storage access. Samba is a self-hosted application focused on network, storage, utility, files. It can be deployed on any device via Docker Compose. It supports a wide range of use cases for homelabs and self-hosted infrastructure.
usecases: Self-host Samba on your home server to smb/cifs file sharing server for network storage access without depending on third-party cloud services.
Use Samba to manage your network workflows privately, keeping all data under your control on local infrastructure.
